abstract: The outcome of a trial that failed to show that Zetia has any medical benefits adds to concerns over the drug.
snippet: The outcome of a trial that failed to show that Zetia has any medical benefits adds to concerns over the drug.
lead_paragraph: A clinical trial of Zetia, a cholesterol-lowering drug prescribed to about 1 million people a week, failed to show that the drug has any medical benefits, Merck and Schering-Plough said on Monday.

headline.main: Drug Has No Benefit in Trial, Makers Say
